    • Uses of SchemaDataHeap in com.gridgraph.storage.heap.heapfile.schema

      Subclasses of SchemaDataHeap in com.gridgraph.storage.heap.heapfile.schema 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EdgePrimaryDataHeap
      Representation of heap file for storage of edge primary data.
      Data of an edge is stored separately: primary data means 'from/to vertex id', and 'next edge' for 'from/to vertex', while secondary data means 'previous edge id' for 'from/to vertex' and 'property tuple id'
      class  EdgeSecondaryDataHeap
      Representation of heap file for storage of edge secondary data.
      Data of an edge is stored separately: primary data means 'from/to vertex id', and 'next edge' for 'from/to vertex', while secondary data means 'previous edge id' for 'from/to vertex' and 'property tuple id'
      class  VertexDegreeDataHeap
      Representation of heap file for storage of vertex degree data.
      class  VertexPrimaryDataHeap
      Representation of heap file for storage of vertex primary data.
      Data of an vertex is stored separately: primary data means 'first edge id', and 'property id', while other data exists, e.g.
